thread.section_title: Servcorp Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servcorp | servcorp.com.au
thread.title: Chris Garlick

author: Chris Garlick
title: Chris Garlick
text:
I have been a user of the Servcorp facility on and off since 1997. I recently established a virtual office for my Century 21 Stock Central franchise.
This operation supply's stock to the C21 Network and as such does not deal on a day to day with the public. It was once again important for me to have a AAA address as I shall be launching into China within 6 months.
The process was first class and Gemma was a delight to deal with as well as very professional. I recommend all serious businesses that require short term or virtual representation to consider Servcorp.
I am a genuine user and have not been paid for my comment Chris Garlick 0417 427 535
